requirements.title: Zoom in button increases canvas zoom level
requirements.description: Users can click the zoom in button to incrementally increase the canvas zoom level for detailed node editing

validation.notes: Validates zoom in button functionality and canvas zoom level increase

requirements.title: Zoom out button decreases canvas zoom level
requirements.description: Users can click the zoom out button to incrementally decrease the canvas zoom level for workflow overview

validation.notes: Validates zoom out button functionality and canvas zoom level decrease

requirements.title: Fit view centers and sizes canvas to show all nodes
requirements.description: Users can click fit view to automatically center and zoom the canvas to display all workflow nodes

validation.notes: Validates fit view centers canvas with all nodes visible

requirements.title: Undo button reverts the last canvas change
requirements.description: Users can click undo to revert the most recent canvas modification (node add/delete/move, connection changes)

validation.notes: Validates undo reverts node addition, deletion, and position changes

requirements.title: Redo button re-applies undone changes
requirements.description: Users can click redo to re-apply the most recently undone change

requirements.title: Lock/unlock canvas prevents/allows node interaction
requirements.description: Users can toggle canvas lock to prevent accidental node movements and edits during review

validation.notes: Validates lock prevents node dragging and unlock re-enables interaction

requirements.title: Duplicate button copies selected nodes
requirements.description: Users can select nodes and click duplicate to create copies with offset positions

validation.notes: Validates node duplication with proper positioning

requirements.title: Delete button removes selected nodes
requirements.description: Users can select nodes and click the delete button to remove them (alternative to keyboard shortcut)

validation.notes: Validates toolbar delete button removes selected nodes
